org.apache.juneau.transform

Class SurrogateSwap<T,F>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.transform.PojoSwap<T,F>
      • org.apache.juneau.transform.SurrogateSwap<T,F>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class type that this transform applies to.
    F - The transformed class type.

    public class SurrogateSwap<T,F>
extends PojoSwap<T,F>
    Specialized PojoSwap for Surrogate classes.

    • Method Detail

      • findPojoSwaps

        public static List<SurrogateSwap<?,?>> findPojoSwaps(Class<?> c,
                                                     BeanContext bc)
        Given the specified surrogate class, return the list of POJO swaps.

        A transform is returned for each public 1-arg constructor found. Returns an empty list if no public 1-arg constructors are found.

        Parameters:
        c - The surrogate class.
        bc - The bean context to use for looking up annotations.
        Returns:
        The list of POJO swaps that apply to this class.

      • swap

        public F swap(BeanSession session,
              T o)
       throws SerializeException
        Description copied from class: PojoSwap
        If this transform is to be used to serialize non-serializable POJOs, it must implement this method.

        The object must be converted into one of the following serializable types:

        • String
        • Number
        • Boolean
        • Collection containing anything on this list.
        • Map containing anything on this list.
        • A java bean with properties of anything on this list.
        • An array of anything on this list.
        Overrides:
        swap in class PojoSwap<T,F>
        Parameters:
        session - The bean session to use to get the class meta. This is always going to be the same bean context that created this swap.
        o - The object to be transformed.
        Returns:
        The transformed object.
        Throws:
        SerializeException

      • unswap

        public T unswap(BeanSession session,
                F f,
                ClassMeta<?> hint)
         throws ParseException
        Description copied from class: PojoSwap
        If this transform is to be used to reconstitute POJOs that aren't true Java beans, it must implement this method.
        Overrides:
        unswap in class PojoSwap<T,F>
        Parameters:
        session - The bean session to use to get the class meta. This is always going to be the same bean context that created this swap.
        f - The transformed object.
        hint - If possible, the parser will try to tell you the object type being created. For example, on a serialized date, this may tell you that the object being created must be of type GregorianCalendar.
        This may be null if the parser cannot make this determination.
        Returns:
        The narrowed object.
        Throws:
        ParseException
